attributes.title: NASTAY
attributes.review:
I ordered the Ravioli with cheese because I had nothing to eat in my house except my dishwasher, but it still needed to be fully cooked before I consumed it so I ordered the Ravioli. The package came late, and there were only 1 singular Ravioli even though I SPECIFICALLY ordered TWO AND THREE QUARTERS. EXTREMELY AGGRAVATED, OBVIOUSLY. The one ravioli tasted scrumptious, with a hint of dish soap to go along with the melted cheese, adding to my craving for dishwashers. I fed some to my giraffe and I think he really liked it. 

Update: he did not like it. Currently throwing up the remains of my ravioli. But I donâ€™t want the food to go to waste, Iâ€™ll eat it later.

Anyway, for anyone who sees this, DONâ€™T BUY THE RAVIOLI. Instead, go to 5613 Pasta Avenue and bring food (preferably orange peels and golden oreos). I am very hungry.
